LanguageData.FT_FuelGenerator.label: mobile chemfuel generator
LanguageData.FT_FuelGenerator.description: Produces power by consuming chemfuel. Must be periodically refueled by hand.
LanguageData.FT_ENIAC.label: E.N.I.A.C.
LanguageData.FT_ENIAC.description: Short for Electronic Numerical Integrator And Computer, increases research speed by 25% when placed near hi-tech research bench and unlocks new research projects.\n\nEach research bench can connect to up to 4 E.N.I.A.C.s.
LanguageData.FT_AntennaTower.label: Antenna tower
LanguageData.FT_AntennaTower.description: Functionally identical to the standard trade beacon. You can only sell goods to orbital traders if they're near an orbital trade beacon. Cannot be placed indoors.
LanguageData.FT_Radio.label: Radio terminal
LanguageData.FT_Radio.description: Allows radio contact with other factions and orbital traders, with the chance of locating precious metals.
LanguageData.FT_FirefoamPopper.label: hydrant
LanguageData.FT_FirefoamPopper.description: When it detects fire, this safety device pops and sprays a fire-retardant foam in a circular field around itself. Can also be triggered manually.
